verbs.description: asian elephants [V: may] have maths skills closer to humans than any other animal there are plenty of animals that have the ability to count even without the use of language but of all the non - human species in the world the asian elephant elephas maximus appears to be the true mathematician empire of japan elephants authai naoko irie animal japan journal of ethology graduate university for advanced studies
